City Council

Meetings

6:30 p.m.  |  2nd and 4th Tuesday of the month
Bulverde City Hall (30360 Cougar Bend, Bulverde, TX 78163)
View the City Calendar for the most up-to-date meeting schedule. 

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available prior to the meetings.

City Council Meeting Information

Members

  • Helen Hays, Mayor | Term Expires May 2028 
  • Jason Krawietz, Council Member Place 1 | Term Expires May 2028
  • Francesca Watson, Council Member Place 2 | Term Expires May 2028
  • Ted Hawkins, Council Member Place 3 | Term Expires May 2026
  • Clint Hays, Council Member Place 4 | Term Expires May 2026
  • Joe Alexandre, Council Member Place 5 | Term Expires May 2027
  • Christopher Goth, Council Member Place 6 | Term Expires May 2027

To contact a member of the City Council, please click on their respective name above. To contact ALL members of the City Council, please click here.

About the Council

The City Council of Bulverde is comprised of a Mayor and 6 Council members elected at-large.

Council may meet earlier than the regular scheduled meetings if there is an Executive Session scheduled. The Council may hold a Special Meeting so long as it complies with the Texas Open Meetings Act.
